title: Night's Yawning Peal
description: 8 Tales of horror and possession by masters of the macabre, including, "The Case of Charles Dexter Ward," by H.P. Lovecraft.You are invited to accompany:H.P. Lovecraft on a nerve twisting journey to an ancient castle in Transylvania where age-old evil is brought back to deadly life.Algernon Blackwood on an excursion into the peaceful English countryside, where pagan rites turn a beautiful forest into a jungle of horror.Robert Bloch on a visit to a collector of macabre manuscripts, whose dreams of glory crumble into a screaming nightmare.Manly Wade Wellman on the trail of a legendary Indian spirit who embodies the red man's ultimate revenge.Lord Dunsany on an investigation into reincarnation the yields shocking results.This is just part of what awaits you in this ghastliest tour of terror ever put between the covers of a book.
author: August Derleth
